body.name: MIRRORVANA Small Compact 15X Magnifying Mirror for Travel - Handheld, Foldable & Lightweight - Mini Pocket-Sized Magnified Mirror for Purse - Square 3.3” x 3.3” Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 26 mins
features: GREAT THINGS COME IN SMALL PACKAGES – This mirror may be small and compact but it comes with both a true view 1x mirror on the top side and a 15X magnification mirror on the bottom.

IDEAL FOR YOUR MID-DAY RETOUCHES, or even for putting on your contacts, tweezing your eyebrows or removing blackheads. **Please note that due to the extreme magnification, you have to be at a fairly close distance when using or your reflection will appear upside down. This is normal and expected for any mirror with ultra-high magnification.
SMALL AND COMPACT – The mirror only weighs 96.5g (3.4 ounces) and measures 3.3 X 3.3 inches making it super travel friendly. It’s easy and light to carry in your purse anywhere and everywhere.
EASY OPEN – We’ve designed it so that it opens easily and closes securely. The hinge is also designed to stay open while you are using the mirror.

1000-DAY RETURN/REFUND POLICY – We're Mirrorvana and we know mirrors. We are also serious about customer satisfaction. Your purchase is covered by our 1000-day policy. In the unlikely event, you feel that you’re not 100% happy with your purchase, just let us know and we’ll take care of everything for you.

reviews.reviewText: I this mirror is perfect for my purse and for travel. The magnifying side is great for makeup and the regular mirror is great for doing hair and being able to look in the bathroom mirror.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little mirror, a bit heavy for a handbag
reviews.reviewText: I do really like this mirror, but it's fairly heavy for a purse or travel situation. The extra magnification is nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: Great little mirror! I just wanted something that would stay upright to allow me to set it on a table to put on makeup when a bathroom or other mirror isn't available when I'm traveling, or when I want to be able to put on makeup in natural lighting rather than in the bathroom. I'm surprisingly taken with this mirror - it looks really nice and there is no cheap paint to scratch when it's bouncing around in a bag. The size is just big enough to let you see your whole face but small enough to be very portable. I love that it has dual hinges (the single hinge on my past several compact mirrors has failed rather quickly). The magnetic closure is a great feature since the snap type closure on other compact mirrors also seems to break quickly (I'm looking at you, Conair). Most importantly, the hinge tension allows you to set it upright and angle it however you want. I find it so difficult to sort out the good products from the garbage when purchasing online, so hopefully this info helps other buyers. I also want to make sure the manufacturer doesn't discontinue this in case I want another one down the road!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this! Now my favorite hand held mirror. Love the clarity of mirrors and that the case will easily open and stay open if I set it down. The feel in my hand is smooth and easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great size, I like the magnification. With that being said, it needs to fold back to stand on its own, AND It needs a light. It is impossible to put on Helier while holding the mirror, which you have to do.

No estaba segura de comprar este espejo porque vi comentarios que decían que era muy pesado, pero como tengo un Mirrorvana que uso para peinarme en la casa me arriesgué. Llegó en un sobre con papel burbuja y el espejo además estaba dentro de una cajita de cartón de Mirrorvana muy bonita y práctica por si lo quieres regalar.El espejo se siente de buena calidad y yo en lo personal no lo encuentro pesado para nada; pensé que 15X a lo mejor iba a ser un aumento excesivo y que me iba a marear pero no fue así, de hecho es muy útil si, por ejemplo, se te mete una pestaña al ojo. El que no tiene aumento también es muy útil para checarte en general el peinado o el maquillaje y así. Aunque es un poco más grande que el espejo de Revlon que tenía antes en mi bolsa, lo puedo manejar con una sola mano sin problemas; eso sí, no se me ha caído, así que sobre eso no puedo opinar. Recomendadísimo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Make-up mirror for my cosmetic bag
reviews.reviewText: Just the right size and very sturdy not like any I’ve had before that the clasp breaks after a few uses. And one side is magnified which is great for putting on eye make-up in the car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good easy to use compact with great magnification. Bloomin scary what I can now see! Would thoroughly recommend. It's not slim but it is a good safe design. I have a slim compact mirror but the magnified image is poor in comparison to this one.

Non vedo molto bene e finalmente ho risolto i miei problemi quando sono fuori casa. Purtroppo l’ingrandimento del cellulare non è sufficiente per me ed avevo difficoltà a ritoccare il trucco in viaggio o al lavoro. Con questo specchio riesco a vedere bene, e’ molto comodo, si apre e si chiude facilmente, grazie alle sue dimensioni l’ho aggiunto senza difficoltà nel beauty delle mie borsette. Lo consiglio.
Grossissement du miroir important pour un modèle de sac.
